segments.text: I notice the woman is focused solely on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost like she's in her own world, unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite brave, standing on that stool to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl is excited, waiting for her share of the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it could tip any moment, which is a bit scary.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flowing steadily, creating a large puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will slip on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame the inside of the house is not as peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are being quite clever, taking advantage of the woman's distraction.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a bit stressful, with so much happening at once.
segments.speaker: PAR
